entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy over southern sections this morning. Clearing late this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
